FEEP-MAPPING.SQL: INSERT INTO feep_datasource (id, name, showname, dialect, ip, port, username, password, dbname, sort, type) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE feep_datasource SET name = ?,showname = ?,dialect = ?,ip = ?,port = ?,username = ?,password = ?,dbname = ?,sort = ?,type = ? WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, name, showname, dialect, ip, port, username, password, dbname, sort, type FROM feep_datasource
SELECT id, name, showname, dialect, ip, port, username, password, dbname, sort, type FROM feep_datasource WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, name, showname, dialect, ip, port, username, password, dbname, sort, type FROM feep_datasource WHERE name = ?
